actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
  pd_id,
  fecha_pd,
  -- ... tus campos actuales ...
  estado,
  cerrado_at,
  cerrado_por
FROM sigco.pd_header
WHERE pd_id = {{ appsmith.store.current_pd_id }};

SELECT
  pd_id,
  fecha_pd,
  -- ... tus campos actuales ...
  estado,
  cerrado_at,
  cerrado_por
FROM sigco.pd_header
WHERE pd_id = {{ appsmith.store.current_pd_id }};

actionConfiguration.body:
{
  "fecha_pd": "{{moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD')}}",
  "responsable": "{{((appsmith.store.me?.first_name || '') + ' ' + (appsmith.store.me?.last_name || '')).trim()}}",
  "clima": "",
  "plan_manana": "",
  "observaciones_generales": "",
  "fecha_carga": "{{moment().toISOString()}}"
}

{
  "fecha_pd": "{{moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD')}}",
  "responsable": "{{((appsmith.store.me?.first_name || '') + ' ' + (appsmith.store.me?.last_name || '')).trim()}}",
  "clima": "",
  "plan_manana": "",
  "observaciones_generales": "",
  "fecha_carga": "{{moment().toISOString()}}"
}

{
  "pd_id": "{{appsmith.store.current_pd_id}}",
  "control_item_id": "{{appsmith.store.boq_selected?.control_item_id}}",
  "etapa_id": "{{selEtapa.selectedOptionValue}}",
  "cantidad_dia": "{{Number(String(inpCantidadDia.text || '0').replace(',', '.'))}}",
  "hh_tarea": "{{Number(String(inpHHTarea.text || '0').replace(',', '.'))}}",
  "personas_tarea": "{{Number(String(inpPersonas.text || '0').replace(',', '.'))}}",
  "ubicacion_referencia": "{{inpUbicacion.text}}",
  "observacion_linea": "{{inpObsProd.text}}"
}

{
  "pd_id": "{{appsmith.store.current_pd_id}}",
  "control_item_id": "{{appsmith.store.boq_selected?.control_item_id}}",
  "etapa_id": "{{selEtapa.selectedOptionValue}}",
  "cantidad_dia": "{{Number(String(inpCantidadDia.text || '0').replace(',', '.'))}}",
  "hh_tarea": "{{Number(String(inpHHTarea.text || '0').replace(',', '.'))}}",
  "personas_tarea": "{{Number(String(inpPersonas.text || '0').replace(',', '.'))}}",
  "ubicacion_referencia": "{{inpUbicacion.text}}",
  "observacion_linea": "{{inpObsProd.text}}"
}

unpublishedAction.name: SIGCO_Update_PDHeader

actionConfiguration.body:
{
  "fecha_pd": "{{moment(dpFechaPd.selectedDate || dpFechaPd.value).format('YYYY-MM-DD')}}",
  "responsable": "{{inpResponsable.text}}",
  "hora_entrada": "{{(() => { const t = (tpEntrada.value || tpEntrada.text || '').trim(); if (!t) return null; return t.length === 5 ? (t + ':00') : t; })()}}",
  "hora_salida": "{{(() => { const t = (tpSalida.value || tpSalida.text || '').trim(); if (!t) return null; return t.length === 5 ? (t + ':00') : t; })()}}",
  "clima": "{{inpClima.text}}",
  "plan_manana": "{{txtPlan.text}}",
  "observaciones_generales": "{{txtObsGen.text}}"
}

jsonPathKeys: (() => { const t = (tpSalida.value || tpSalida.text || '').trim(); if (!t) return null; return t.length === 5 ? (t + ':00') : t; })()
(() => { const t = (tpEntrada.value || tpEntrada.text || '').trim(); if (!t) return null; return t.length === 5 ? (t + ':00') : t; })()

publishedAction.name: SIGCO_Update_PDHeader
